items.content_html: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices. It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.
items.title: babagha/jpd-express-error: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices.   It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.

items.content_html: StyleJS is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify the process of styling HTML elements with enhanced features such as responsive design and media queries. By allowing inline styling directly within HTML elements, StyleJS eliminates the need for external CSS files, making it ideal for quick prototyping and streamlined development.
items.title: ShoaibShokat03/stylejs: StyleJS is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify the process of styling HTML elements with enhanced features such as responsive design and media queries. By allowing inline styling directly within HTML elements, StyleJS eliminates the need for external CSS files, making it ideal for quick prototyping and streamlined development.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
